law.catch_line: This section does not affect the duties of a railroad company or the powers of the Commission regard...

text.section: This section does not affect the duties of a railroad company or the powers of the Commission regarding joint rates.

A railroad company shall receive freight cars of proper standard from other railroad companies at connecting points and haul the cars:
to their destination; or
by the route billed, to the connecting point with the next connecting carrier.
Except on terms and conditions that the Commission establishes, railroad companies may not be required to interchange cars.
